name: The PROFESSIONAL INSURANCE AGENTS ASSOCIATION OF PENNSYLVANIA, MARYLAND AND DELAWARE, INC., and Roger Weber, a Licensed Pennsylvania Insurance Agent, Appellants, v. Cynthia M. MALESKI, in her capacity as Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellee, and The Pennsylvania Assigned Risk Plan, Intervenor/Appellee
name_abbreviation: Professional Insurance Agents Ass'n v. Maleski

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: The PROFESSIONAL INSURANCE AGENTS ASSOCIATION OF PENNSYLVANIA, MARYLAND AND DELAWARE, INC., and Roger Weber, a Licensed Pennsylvania Insurance Agent, Appellants, v. Cynthia M. MALESKI, in her capacity as Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellee, and The Pennsylvania Assigned Risk Plan, Intervenor/Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Patricia Carey Zucker and William R. Balaban, Harrisburg, for Prof. Ins. Agents, et al.
Amy L. Weber, Harrisburg, for Pa. Ins. Dept.
Lewis R. Olshin, William R. Kane and Nicholas M. Centrella, Philadelphia, for intervenor, Pa. A.R.P.
casebody.head_matter:
652 A.2d 293
The PROFESSIONAL INSURANCE AGENTS ASSOCIATION OF PENNSYLVANIA, MARYLAND AND DELAWARE, INC., and Roger Weber, a Licensed Pennsylvania Insurance Agent, Appellants, v. Cynthia M. MALESKI, in her capacity as Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellee, and The Pennsylvania Assigned Risk Plan, Intervenor/Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 7, 1994.
Decided Dec. 30, 1994.
Patricia Carey Zucker and William R. Balaban, Harrisburg, for Prof. Ins. Agents, et al.
Amy L. Weber, Harrisburg, for Pa. Ins. Dept.
Lewis R. Olshin, William R. Kane and Nicholas M. Centrella, Philadelphia, for intervenor, Pa. A.R.P.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
